SELECT A.*, B.*, IFNULL(C.count_reply,0) AS count_reply FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.user_id=B.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT board_num,COUNT(reply_num) AS count_reply FROM reply GROUP BY board_num) C ON C.board_num=A.board_num WHERE A.board_type_num=1 ORDER BY board_num DESC
